description: The software is a list of Abaqus User MATerial subroutines (VUMAT) for modeling granular flow physics. It includes (1) density dependent Mohr-Coulomb model, (2) density dependent Drager-Prager\Cap model, (3)Gudehus-Bauer hypoplastic model, and (4) critical state-based NorSand model.
name: Granular Flow Constitutive Model Add-ons For Abaqus
